tweet.text: The Office of the Historian’s own Dr. Alex Poster will be speaking as a part of a panel on The Evolution of the U.S. Response to HIV/AIDS on Feb 1 at noon at the @DiplomacyCenter. Registration ends today: https://t.co/SPEK6IV8Su #twitterstorians #AIDS
tweet.html: The Office of the Historian’s own Dr. Alex Poster will be speaking as a part of a panel on The Evolution of the U.S. Response to HIV/AIDS on Feb 1 at noon at the @diplomacycenter. Registration ends today: goo.gl/p9xFkz #twitterstorians #AIDS
